section.p: The stranger says he will prove his holiness by preaching a sermon to the local cats, ‘since cats are known to be ungodly creatures.’
He starts to screech and howl in a most unearthly way, and sure enough after a few minutes a group of assorted cats has collected by the roadside to listen.
‘You see?’ says the stranger. ‘They listened raptly, the little darlings. I’m sure they’ll go home better cats for that sermon. Now it’s your turn...’
